data.lyric:
[ti:AA]
[ar:Walker Hayes]
[al:AA]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]AA - Walker Hayes
[00:00.25]Composed by：Walker Hayes/Shane McAnally/Luke Laird
[00:00.50]One two three four
[00:02.29]
[00:11.93]Coffee cup cold and black
[00:13.77]
[00:14.36]Wish you had a little shot of jack
[00:16.17]
[00:16.74]Besides that can't complain
[00:19.07]Just tryin' to do the dang thing
[00:21.39]Might change the oil in my truck
[00:23.58]I ain't payin' no thirty-five bucks
[00:25.75]Kids need shoes mama needs Levi's
[00:28.52]And I'm just tryna keep my daughters off the pole
[00:32.51]And my sons out of jail
[00:34.09]
[00:34.65]Tryna get to church so I don't go to hell
[00:39.20]I'm just tryna keep my wife from figuring out
[00:43.30]
[00:44.07]That I married up and she married way way down
[00:49.45]In Alabama where they love Nick Saban
[00:52.58]
[00:53.09]Tryna write a song the local country station will play
[00:58.32]
[00:58.91]Hey I'm just tryna stay out of AA
[01:02.74]
[01:04.53]AA ooh
[01:06.24]
[01:06.90]Well I gave up and cigarettes
[01:09.50]Now I'm just hooked on Nicorette
[01:11.85]Trying not to be like my old man
[01:14.09]But the older I get the more I am
[01:16.51]Tryna get paid and a little love made y'all
[01:19.24]Hey y'all at the end of the day y'all
[01:20.66]
[01:21.33]I'm just another John Deere guy
[01:22.88]Hey
[01:23.29]Up on a tractor
[01:24.52]Tryna steer my daughters off the pole
[01:27.64]And my sons out of jail
[01:29.58]Sons out of jail
[01:30.29]Tryna get to church so I don't go to hell
[01:34.50]I'm just tryna keep my wife from figuring out
[01:38.74]
[01:39.32]That I married up and she married way way down
[01:44.75]In Alabama where they love Nick Saban
[01:48.25]Tryna write a song the local country station will play
[01:53.74]
[01:54.24]Hey I'm just tryna stay out of AA
[01:58.51]Ooh ooh come on babe right here
[02:01.68]
[02:02.59]Ooh ooh ooh tryna stay out of AA every day
[02:09.92]One step at a time yeah
[02:11.43]
[02:12.08]Life's hard family's weird
[02:14.42]Sometimes you just need a beer
[02:16.16]
[02:16.67]Can I get an Amen
[02:18.32]Amen
[02:19.09]Man I'm just tryna keep my daughters off the pole
[02:22.99]And my sons out of jail
[02:24.65]Sons out of jail
[02:25.53]Tryna get to church so I don't go to hell
[02:29.87]I'm just tryna keep my wife from figuring out
[02:34.08]I love you
[02:34.92]That I married up and she married way way down
[02:40.06]In Alabama where they love Nick Saban
[02:43.27]
[02:43.91]Tryna write a song the local country station will play
[02:49.07]
[02:49.61]Hey I'm just tryna stay out of AA
[02:53.45]
[02:56.63]Oh hey hey hey I'm just tryna stay out of AA
[03:02.83]
[03:04.45]Yes I am
data.trans:
[ti:AA]
[ar:Walker Hayes]
[al:AA]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯音乐享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:00.25]//
[00:00.50]一 二 三 四
[00:02.29]
[00:11.93]品尝着冰镇黑咖啡
[00:13.77]
[00:14.36]希望你能喝一杯Jack Daniels威士忌酒
[00:16.17]
[00:16.74]除此之外 没什么好抱怨的
[00:19.07]只想做到尽善尽美
[00:21.39]也许给车子更换汽油
[00:23.58]我不会付三十五块钱
[00:25.75]孩子们需要鞋子 妈妈需要Levi's牛仔裤
[00:28.52]我只想让我的女儿不用靠跳舞谋生
[00:32.51]让我的儿子离开监狱
[00:34.09]
[00:34.65]去教堂做礼拜 这样我就不会堕入地狱
[00:39.20]我只是不想让我的妻子知道
[00:43.30]
[00:44.07]我拥有幸福的婚姻生活 她却要为家庭操劳
[00:49.45]在阿拉巴马州 人们都喜欢Nick Saban
[00:52.58]
[00:53.09]试着写一首当地乡村音乐电台愿意播放的歌
[00:58.32]
[00:58.91]我不想参加嗜酒者互诫协会
[01:02.74]
[01:04.53]嗜酒者互诫协会
[01:06.24]
[01:06.90]我已经戒掉香烟
[01:09.50]现在我只是对Nicorette欲罢不能
[01:11.85]尽量不让自己变成我爸爸那样
[01:14.09]但是随着年龄的增长 我却越来越像他
[01:16.51]努力赚钱 沐浴爱河
[01:19.24]各位 今天快要结束了
[01:20.66]
[01:21.33]我只是另一个约翰迪尔男孩
[01:22.88]//
[01:23.29]坐在拖拉机上
[01:24.52]试图引导我的女儿 不要靠跳舞谋生
[01:27.64]让我的儿子离开监狱
[01:29.58]儿子离开监狱
[01:30.29]去教堂做礼拜 这样我就不会堕入地狱
[01:34.50]我只是不想让我的妻子知道
[01:38.74]
[01:39.32]我拥有幸福的婚姻生活 她却要为家庭操劳
[01:44.75]在阿拉巴马州 人们都喜欢Nick Saban
[01:48.25]试着写一首当地乡村音乐电台愿意播放的歌
[01:53.74]
[01:54.24]我不想参加嗜酒者互诫协会
[01:58.51]来吧 宝贝 我在你身边
[02:01.68]
[02:02.59]不想参加嗜酒者互诫协会
[02:09.92]一步一个脚印
[02:11.43]
[02:12.08]生活艰难 家人关系疏离
[02:14.42]有时你只是需要一杯啤酒
[02:16.16]
[02:16.67]能否有人对我说一声阿门
[02:18.32]阿门
[02:19.09]上帝啊 我只想让我的女儿不用靠跳舞谋生
[02:22.99]让我的儿子离开监狱
[02:24.65]儿子离开监狱
[02:25.53]去教堂做礼拜 这样我就不会堕入地狱
[02:29.87]我只是不想让我的妻子知道
[02:34.08]我深爱着你
[02:34.92]我拥有幸福的婚姻生活 她却要为家庭操劳
[02:40.06]在阿拉巴马州 人们都喜欢Nick Saban
[02:43.27]
[02:43.91]试着写一首当地乡村音乐电台愿意播放的歌
[02:49.07]
[02:49.61]我不想参加嗜酒者互诫协会
[02:53.45]
[02:56.63]我不想参加嗜酒者互诫协会
[03:02.83]
[03:04.45]没错 我本意如此
